ASySD: Automated Citation Deduplication

Source: R/ASySD-package.R
ASySD-package.Rd

The Automated Systematic Search Deduplicator ('ASySD') includes functions to automatically detect and remove duplicate citations from literature searches. For details, see our paper "The Automated Systematic Search Deduplicator (ASySD): a rapid, open-source, interoperable tool to remove duplicate citations in biomedical systematic reviews. Hair K / Bahor Z / Macleod M / Liao J / Sena E (2023) doi:10.1186/s12915-023-01686-z .

See also
